title: Woman, 47, 'preyed on 14 year-old boys for sex after plying them with booze'
text:
Amalia Marie Utz is accused of sexually abusing two 14 year-old boys after throwing booze and drug-fueled parties for underage children at her home in Calabasas, California, right (Pictures: Ventura County Sheriff’s Office/Google Maps)

A 47 year-old woman is accused of sexually abusing two 14 year-old boys after inviting youngsters over to her house for booze and drugs, police say.

Amalia Marie Utz, of Oak Park in California, was arrested over a rumor she’d sexually assaulted one of the youngsters on October 9.

Venture County Sheriff’s Office then discovered that Utz may also have forced herself on another boy who was the same age.

She was arrested on suspicion of lewd and lascivious acts with a minor and oral copulation with a minor under 16.

It is unclear how Utz met either of the two children she has now been accused of assaulting.

They found out there had been numerous calls to Utz’s home for ‘juvenile disturbances, found runaways, juveniles in possession of and smoking marijuana.’

Utz is also accused of throwing ‘high school age parties,’ giving booze to underage children, as well as reckless driving.

The suspect was booked in jail, then released on Monday after posting $20,000 bail.

Utz is due back in court on October 25, with sheriff’s deputies now investigating if she could have abused other children.
description: Amalia Utz is said to have sexually assaulted two young boys after regularly throwing booze and drug-fueled parties in Calabasas, California
